pages.title: Mana Attunemnt
pages.text: This upgrades gives you Mana discount upto 20%% (5%% per level). $(br2)Trained by: Casting spells and consuming Mana $(br2)Max Level: 4
Level 1: 4 upgrade points $(br)Level 2: 10 upgrade points $(br)Level 3: 22 upgrade points $(br)Level 4: 40 upgrade points $(br)
